verses.verse: Why <S%H4100><s%> do the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H7283>rage,<s%> and the <S%H3816>people<s%> <S%H1897>imagine<s%> a vain <S%H7385>thing?<s%>

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> set <S%H3320>themselves,<s%> and the <S%H7336>rulers<s%> take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> saying,
Let us break their bands <S%H5423>asunder,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4147><s%> and cast <S%H7993>away<s%> their <S%H5688>cords<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> us.
He that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh:<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have them in <S%H3932>derision.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shall he <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and <S%H926>vex<s%> them in his sore <S%H2740>displeasure.<s%>

I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H2706>decree:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H1121>Son;<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> have <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3205>begotten<s%> thee.

Ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> me, and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and the uttermost <S%H657>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for thy <S%H272>possession.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> thou shalt dash them in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> like a <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>
Be <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, O ye <S%H4428>kings:<s%> be <S%H3256>instructed,<s%> ye <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Kiss <S%H5401><s%> the <S%H1248>Son,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he be <S%H599>angry,<s%> and ye <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H1197>kindled<s%> but a <S%H4592>little.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> they that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
